name: Crossover Hiring Platform
description:
Led the engineering team building and operating Crossover's global hiring platform, processing tens of thousands of applications monthly from hundreds of thousands of visitors.

Deeply involved in implementing AI-powered features including automatic AI grading of assessments, AI-based candidate screening and matching, and various AI automations throughout the hiring funnel.

The platform handles the complete hiring lifecycle from sourcing and application processing to assessment management and candidate experience across multiple channels.
